content:
Some properties that could be associated with a comment in the context of the spinal implant identification app could include:

1. Comment ID: A unique identifier for each comment.
2. Comment text: The actual text of the comment.
3. Comment author: The user who authored the comment.
4. Timestamp: The date and time the comment was created.
5. Attachment: An optional attachment associated with the comment, such as an image or file.
6. Replies: A list of replies to the comment.
7. Status: A status indicating whether the comment has been resolved or requires further action.
8. Related case: The case to which the comment is associated.
9. Mentioned users: A list of users who are mentioned in the comment.
10. Reaction: An optional reaction or emoticon associated with the comment, such as a thumbs-up or smiley face.
